Introduction to Raspberry PI and Scratch

Discover how computers work by building your own Raspberry PI computer and use Scratch to create animations. For ages 11 to 14. Registration required. Please commit to both classes.

Date 8/23/2017, 8/24/2017
Time 1 p.m. to 2:30 p.m.
Event Type Technology
Age Group Teen
Branch Owings Mills
Note

Attendee must be between the ages of 11 and 14 years old.
Status

We're sorry. This event is currently full.
